revised_title: Joint Replacement Prostheses: Design and Testing for Arthritis Treatment
tldr: The article discusses the design and testing of joint replacement prostheses for arthritis treatment. The author emphasizes the importance of providing acceptable function, working life, and cost for the prostheses. Key factors affecting the working life of the prosthesis, such as infection, loosening, and component failure, are also considered.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Orthopedic Surgery
